input.content: Given the user-provided binary array, map the binary array onto a grid, wherein the dimensions of the grid are as provided by the user ([num rows]x[num elements per row]), and the mapping to the grid is done from left to right, top to bottom (provide a visualization of the mapped result). Then explain in a second visualization how the final row of the grid was mapped from the corresponding final binary numbers of the array. Lastly, provide the final row of the grid, in minified JSON format, like this: {"Final Row":[...]}
